summary: Solomon, Prophet and the King, has asked God to give him an ideal kingdom which has never been given to anybody before. He is told to prepare himself and his subjects with evil and unearthly creatures that haunt the men.
cast: Amin Zendegani|Mahmood Pakniat|Elham Hamidi|Hossein Mahjoub|Alireza Kamalinejad|Zahra Saeedi|Mehdi Faghih|Javad Taheri|Sirous Saber|Akbar Mannani|Somayyeh Rahnemun|Arshia Zeinali|Seth Leslie
title: Molke Soleiman
